6008.verse: فَأَمَّا|And as for|88|104|265$ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ|man,|90|121|3927$إِذَا مَا|when|74|105|5236$ٱبْتَلَـٰهُ|tries him|76|107|18112$رَبُّهُۥ|his Lord|71|102|1128$فَأَكْرَمَهُۥ|and is generous to him|170|186|18113$وَنَعَّمَهُۥ|and favors him,|122|165|18114$فَيَقُولُ|he says,|76|162|5331$رَبِّىٓ|`My Lord|80|166|2902$أَكْرَمَنِ|has honored me.`|138|181|18115$

6009.verse: وَأَمَّآ|But|61|70|269$إِذَا مَا|when|74|92|5236$ٱبْتَلَـٰهُ|He tries him|98|116|18112$فَقَدَرَ|and restricts|104|122|18116$عَلَيْهِ|for him|65|84|395$رِزْقَهُۥ|his provision,|106|124|17136$فَيَقُولُ|then he says|106|115|5331$رَبِّىٓ|`My Lord|80|296|2902$أَهَـٰنَنِ|(has) humiliated me.`|163|379|18117$

6012.verse: وَتَأْكُلُونَ|And you consume|137|201|18121$ٱلتُّرَاثَ|the inheritance|120|248|18122$أَكْلاً لَّمًّا|devouring altogether,|162|226|18123$

6015.verse: وَجَآءَ|And comes|92|134|7815$رَبُّكَ|your Lord|82|167|310$وَٱلْمَلَكُ|and the Angels,|124|209|17242$صَفًّا صَفًّا|rank upon rank,|123|165|18128$

5996.verse: And [by] the even [number] and the odd

5997.verse: And [by] the night when it passes,

5998.verse: Is there [not] in [all] that an oath [sufficient] for one of perception?

5999.verse: Have you not considered how your Lord dealt with 'Aad -

6001.verse: The likes of whom had never been created in the land?

6002.verse: And [with] Thamud, who carved out the rocks in the valley?

6003.verse: And [with] Pharaoh, owner of the stakes? -

6004.verse: [All of] whom oppressed within the lands

6006.verse: So your Lord poured upon them a scourge of punishment.

6007.verse: Indeed, your Lord is in observation.

6008.verse: And as for man, when his Lord tries him and [thus] is generous to him and favors him, he says, "My Lord has honored me."

6009.verse: But when He tries him and restricts his provision, he says, "My Lord has humiliated me."

6010.verse: No! But you do not honor the orphan

6011.verse: And you do not encourage one another to feed the poor.

6012.verse: And you consume inheritance, devouring [it] altogether,

6013.verse: And you love wealth with immense love.

6014.verse: No! When the earth has been leveled - pounded and crushed -

6015.verse: And your Lord has come and the angels, rank upon rank,

6016.verse: And brought [within view], that Day, is Hell - that Day, man will remember, but what good to him will be the remembrance?
